ServerURIOrLanPortDescription: If it is a local server, do not use a URL like http://10.10.123.321:5221/, but use http://localhost:port number, so that the browser does not automatically try to access the HTTPS site and fail.
Title: Tiddler Title
SelectElementToClip: Select an element on the page to clip...
OpenPopupToClipWhenDone: When selecting is done, click browser extension icon to start clipping.
WelcomeDescription: Open the "Options", fill-in the local knowledge base URL and you're ready to go.
AssetTableDescription: Asset List, Click to preview, Check to clip
DefaultTagsForAssetsDescription: Assets such as images can also be clipped and referenced in Markdown or WikiText. The tags for these resources can be set here to differentiate them from the main content of the page.

Error.WebServer403: 错误403：你需要允许太微服务器执行任意筛选器
Error.WebServerCORS: 错误CORS：你的浏览器擅自把请求改为了HTTPS，导致请求失败

ClearAllServersConfirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to clear all servers?
